snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda : Majora's Mask - Intro
snippet.description:
Figured since I have some other things to take care of that I'd record a few cutscenes and boss fights from Majora's Mask (mini bosses too). And in delicious widescreen!

It won't be a complete playthrough, more or less getting and capturing important moments of the game in HD.

Do note though that there's one odd problem with the emulation that you might not notice right away, a part of the screen tears a bit in certain cutscenes.
